androidx.slice.widget

Class RemoteInputView

  • java.lang.Object
    • LinearLayout
      • androidx.slice.widget.RemoteInputView

  • public class RemoteInputView
extends LinearLayout
    Host for the remote input.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  RemoteInputView.RemoteEditText
      An EditText that changes appearance based on whether it's focusable and becomes un-focusable whenever the user navigates away from it or it becomes invisible.
